name: Spacebound (itch) (Jenoah, LiamvanAsten)
description:
Put on your space suit, collect resources on various vibrant planetary systems, and fight monsters that are as colorful as they are deadly!

Features:

  • Use your powerful blaster to combat monster
  • Collect all the minerals scattered in the galaxy
  • Explore different planets in all kinds of galaxies

Team:

  • Artist: Kimiya Maghsoodi (Concertizing, 2D Art & UI Design)
  • Artist: Liam van Asten (Game Design & 3D Art)
  • Designer: Tal Aviv (Marketing & Presentations)
  • Designer: Yoan Nikolov (Promotional & Game Design)
  • Engineer: Arjen van Klaveren (Mechanics & AI)
  • Engineer: Jenoah Kers (Mechanics & Procedural Generation)
